source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: repression of writing since Plato constitutes philosophy as epistēmē: truth as unity of logos and phonē > deconstruction of logocentrism not psychoanalysis of philosophy

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: [see MYSTIC WRITING PAD MACHINE]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: acc. Freud, repression is not forgetting, not exclusion, an interior representation

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: repression of writing, the writing interior to speech contained outside it, repression of that which threatens presence > mastering of absence

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: logo-phonocentrism is necessary and necessarily finite [Derrida’s faith?] > history of the possibility of symbolism

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: why Derrida hesitates to utilize Freud’s psychoanalytic concepts: belong to history of metaphysics, logocentric repression which excludes written trace, calls it servile, excrement

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: why Derrida won’t utilize Freud’s psychoanalytic concepts

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: acc. Heidegger, Hegel and Descartes conceive self-presence w/in opposition of consciousness to unconsciousness

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: differance, pre-opening of ontic-ontological distinction, & of all the differences which furrow (sillonnant) Freudian conceptuality

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: difference btwn pleasure/reality principle: original possibility of economy of death, of detour, deferral

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: must deconstruct linguistic phonologism in psychoanalysis [?]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud never reflected on the precautions he takes, deconstruction will/does

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: differance & identity, differance in economy of the same

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: archi-trace, differance, neither Freudian nor Heideggerian concepts

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: necessity of archi-trace and erasure of archia [see POOF pp. 24, 32], erasure signifies conceived relationship of belonging to history of metaphysics

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: manipulate metaphors: 1) make the known an allusion to the unknown 2) making enigmatic through insistence of “metaphoric investment” > Freud does the latter

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: our reading will let metaphoric investment “invade the entirety of the psyche”

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: breaching, Bahnung, frayage (tracing of a trail, also pathbreaking)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud wants to maintain a permanence of trace and the virginity of the receiving substance [see pp. 204, 223] > such apparatus almost unimaginable

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Derrida describes Freud’s development from Project to “Note on Mystic Writing-Pad” > Wunderblock, a solution to problematic of breaching (metaphorics of written trace)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Φ neurones (no trace of impression, perceptual), Ψ neurones (retain trace)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: memory is essence of psyche for Freud; differential forces [à la Nietzsche] become psychē and mnēmē

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: for both Freud & Nietzsche, psychē requires difference in exertion of forces, no breaching w/out difference

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: for Freud, deferral, detour (Aufschub), death at origin of life [already death drive] defending itself against death via economy of death, the attempt to douse the pain of an original breach

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: differance as non-originary origin, erases myth of origin, determined outside teleological/eschatological horizon [horizon key word here]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: “no doubt life protects itself by repetition, trace, differance”—but there’s no life present at first, life is trace so we can say life is death

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud’s deferral: Nachträglichkeit, Verspätung

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud [of Beyond…] complies w/ dual necessity: differance at origin, crossing-out concept primariness > delay is in the beginning

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: breaching concerns forces & locations, Freud has to reinvent the concept of spacing

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud invents ω neurones btwn ϕ and Ψ to account for that which understands quality, temporality in spacing, that which perceives the period, the break

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: when Freud renounces neurology & anatomical localizations, trace becomes gramme, and region of breaching, a ciphered spacing

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud persists in accounting for psyche in terms of spacing, topography of traces, map of breaches

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud: what is unique about my memory-traces (Errinerungsspuren), memory is present several times, at least 3 registrations (Niederschriften): perception, preconscious, unconscious

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud describes [to Fliess] uncontainable delight in creating a machine that could almost run of itself

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: 2 series of metaphors, text and machine, do not appear at same time in Freud [pp. 220-21 two series of metaphors: perceptual apparatus, origin of memory]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: for Freud, metaphor of writing appropriates problems of psychic apparatus in structure & psychic text in fabric

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: [Freud on tradition of translating dreams]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud: dream-interpreters were versed in symbolic riddling, a ground of interpretation giving the strongest credit to their Art

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Egyptian priests read hieroglyphic code of dreams as a Traumbuch, as condensed meanings contained in storehouse of hieroglyphics [Freud pushes psychical writing further back]

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: via Freud, because there is no exhaustive and absolutely infallible code, the difference btwn signifier & signified is no longer radical [no big Other?]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: for Freud, dreamer invents his own grammar; Freud makes psychical writing so originary, any supposedly proper writing would have to be a metaphor for it

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud adds an idiomatic residue to symbolic, hieroglyphic dream-writing > thus limitation of Egyptian priest’s Chiffriermethode via Traumbuch [p. 210 but Freud proposes his own codes]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: it is the materiality of signifier that is relinquished in translation > when materiality is reinstated, translation becomes poetry

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: agreeing w/ Saussure that signifier/signified two sides of same paper, originary writing must still produce space & materiality of sheet itself

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: since materiality of signifier constitutes idiom of dream scene, dreams are untranslatable

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: to speak of writing, to betray Freud more than ever

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: for Freud, wrong to think simple translation can occur from unconscious to conscious, presupposes immobile master text > unconscious consists of archives always already transcriptions

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: supplement [from Littré]: add what is missing, supply necessary surplus [add plentitude to plenitude]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud’s supplementarity: unconscious not a code book, nachträglich

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud’s theme that there is no purity to living present, formidable for metaphysics, found in a conceptual scheme unequal to the thing itself

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Nachtrag (postscript, appendix, codicil) > present is only a call for a footnote

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: for Freud, consciousness—surface exposed to external world

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: labor of writing erases transcendental distinction btwn origin of world and Being-in-the-world, erases it while producing it

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: an immobile topography [& not a dynamic one] would freeze energy in “a naïve metaphorics of place” > for Freud, must rethink topology/space of conscious writing

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: distinction of force & meaning is derivative in relation to archi-trace

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: “repetition”—death as power, lack of power—institutes translatability, makes possible “language,” transforms absolute idiom into a limit toujours déjà transgressed (pure idiom is not language, becomes so only through repetition), repetition divides point of departure of first time; however, to only look at effect of repetition, at translation, obvious distinction btwn force & meaning, effaces intensity of death drive

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: supplementary delay, pathbreaking, subterranean toil, mole-like

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: is sexual deferral best example or essence of [trace’s] movement? false question > sexuality limited, unlimited, only through inversion, through the answer itself

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: when breaching, breaking of path, becomes route (via rupta) opened in nature, in wood (hyle) [see p. 229] > violent inscription of form opposed to writing, route acquires reversibility in time & space

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Hegel, Plato, Proust perhaps, believe past present can be awakened in its truth

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud’s machine is still an optical one in Traumdeutung

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: perhaps read Freud like Heidegger reads Kant: like cogito, the unconscious is timeless only via vulgar concept of time

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud: psychic locality corresponds to an Ort, where image comes into being, ideal point, no tangible component of microscope [Freud admits imperfection of this imagery]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: fundamental property of writing is spacing: diastem (interval, interruption) & time becoming space, unfolding (not linear time) [see Nancy’s Corpus on diastole]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: two systems necessary in single machine: surface freshness, depth of retention

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: dream-content (manifest) is a transposition which must be transposed back to dream-thoughts (latent)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: in Freud & Artaud, subordination of speech on dream-stage

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: speech, phonetic writing, exceeded by overall writing of dreams, Egyptian cartoon captions, rebuses, picture puzzle (Bilderrätzel)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud: proximity in dream reveals unthought connection like a & b in “ab”

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: pure words and pure things: “theoretical fictions”; words can be treated as things because of spacing, materiality of mark

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: nonspsychical system (machine metaphor) of psychical [like Heidegger’s nontechnology of technology?]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: anti-cathexis (Gegenbesetzung), “sole mechanism of primal repression”

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: when origin of memory and perceptual system are metaphorically united: “perceptual apparatus” must be writing machine

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud privileging mneme to hypomnesis like in Phaedrus, like always > unlike Plato, psyche is caught up in an apparatus

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud’s interest in finding virginal writing surface, a slate that does not conserve imprints, erases traces

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: [Freud describes Mystic Pad]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Mystic Pad depth w/out bottom, stratification of surfaces, whose interior is a similarly exposed surface, perfectly superficial exteriority open to incision of scratch

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: always protection in writing

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: writing as trace survives scratch’s present, punctuality, stigmē

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Kant’s 3 modes of times, 3 analogies of experience: permanence, succession, simultaneity

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: most interesting analogy of Mystic Pad is time, a discontinuous time, time as spacing, withdrawal of perception, periodic non-excitability > interruption/restoration of contact

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: very structure of Freud’s Mystic Pad is the time of writing

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: “primal repression” contradicts primary process, myth of maintenance > writing is unthinkable w/out repression

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: writing unthinkable w/out repression > Freud uses metaphor of censorship, writing as vigilance [neither permanent contact] & failure [nor permanent break] of censorship

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: no sovereign solitude of author

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: two hands needed to operate Freud’s Mystic Pad

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: if there were only perception, pure permeability of breaching, there would be no breaches (frayages), no legible writing, but pure perception does not exist: nous ne sommes écrits qu’en écrivants, par l’instance en nous qui toujours déjà surveille la perception, qu’elle soit interne ou externe ——we must be several in order to write, even to “perceive”

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: traces produce space of their inscription by acceding to period of their erasure, traces constituted by double force of repetition & erasure, of legibility & illegibility

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: via Freud’s frustration w/ analogy of Mystic Pad, machine is dead, is death, does not run of itself > representation is dead, death is (only) representation

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud’s Writing Pad (machine) can’t run of itself (like living memory of Plato), a dead complexity w/out depth, multiplicity of layered surfaces

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: “life as depth belongs only to the wax of psychical memory,” Plato’s mnemic writing

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: we would search public in vain for first reader, i.e. first author of a work

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: perhaps we need a new name for technology to remove from traditional problematic

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: machine and thus representation is death and finitude w/in psyche, idea of finitude derived from movement of supplementarity

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: this opening never made explicit, but became urgent in relation to the [failure] of rhetorical device of metaphor [re: Mystic Pad]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud augured a beyond and beneath of “Platonic” closure > by opening to theme of writing, writing as technē, as relation btwn life & death, btwn psychical and nonpsychical

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: instead of machine being a pure absence of spontaneity, its resemblance to psychical apparatus bears witness to finitude of mnemic spontaneity thus supplemented

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: writing is stage of history & play of world

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: must extract Freud’s trace from metaphysics of presence it’s caught up in (particularly in concepts like perception, memory, unconscious, conscious, reality)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud performed for us the scene of writing > le discours de Freud y est pris

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: concept of subject requires concept of substance (thus presence)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: erasure [of trace] is death itself

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: unerasable trace, not a trace, full-presence, son of God, sign of parousia, not a seed, not a mortal germ

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: thought of trace fecundated by psychoanalysis: 1) study writing in a psychopathology of everyday life 2) a history of writing 3) a psychoanalysis of literature respectful of originality of the literary signifier (not yet begun) 4) problematize boundaries, psychoanalytic graphology (i.e. Melanie Klein)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: for Freud, erasure of trace, as movement of pure auto-affection, temporalization, makes repression “itself” possible, escapes binarism and makes binarism possible on basis of nothing > useful to deconstruct logocentrism and to exercise at different levels of writing in general

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Derrida on fruitfulness of Freud’s radicalization of erasure of trace

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: a psychoanalysis respectful of literary signifier has not yet begun

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: trace is constituted by its irremediable disappearance—disappearance of its disappearance, erasure of selfhood, of one’s own presence

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: eating words, as excrement, as nourishing honey, as inky dust of law [Ezekiel, Numbers]

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: Freud: memory renews by itself its means to action (unlike photograph)

source.title: Freud and the Scene of Writing

content: against Freud?: a rigorous determination of the anomaly [btwn word-representation & think-representation in dreams]  is impossible
